281.comment: A simple rectangle-pin that has an annotation attached to it. Hover to see the annotation, click to edit it. Also, Text can be converted to an annotation through the morph menu.

581.comment: A simple box morph. A really blue one. Its amazing what you can build out of simple boxes.... Who needs stars when you got blue rectangles!
